name: Flippy Floor
description:
Reload the browser once before you play to make the game appear!

In Flippy Floor, you can't stop flipping the floor.

Everywhere you go, the floor will flip; all you need to do is make them all yellow...

Easy, hey? Well, not once you realize there's walls and gaps and different kinds of seeking enemies! In fact, there's even a class of levels called "Impossible."

Even if you complete every level by some miracle, your work's not finished: a dynamic scoring system allows you to always make progress.

Also playable at flippyfloor.surge.sh.

All my games can be found on my website, plett.dev/games.
